title: Quotes from Jacques Cousteau will send you off the deep end for nature : theCHIVE
text:
View as Slideshow 1 
Jacques Cousteau garners much of his fame from television specials that showed him diving into the depths of the oceans. He wasnâ€™t just an avid explorer and oceanographer though. Before becoming famous, Cousteau was a French Naval officer. He was a conservationist, inventor, innovator, photographer and author. He had a lust for life that was only surpassed by his love of the oceans. 
He was also a man not known to mince words. Here are just a few quotes by the late explorer and scientist to get you off your ass and motivated this Monday morning. 2
